title: Unstable Ping experience from Hong Kong
body:
I was on NA server a few years ago and transfer to Oce server last year.
The ping was around 120 - 130 which is pretty cool for me 
But after a patch update in early March, the ping jump and get solid  to 25x - 27x.
Its really frustrating me and I know my frds around also have the same ping and lag problem.

Would you please advise me how can I fix the issue? Thanks a lot!

replies.body:
same for me man but it was posted on another thread that riot got their cable broken or smth
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GYiftAVf-is-anyone-getting-massive-lag-that-wont-stop?comment=00010000
its explained here
